body_html: I ran your network through a profiler and identified a few bottlenecks. In general, we should be able to cut the iteration time by around a half in the multi-GPU case, and around 1/3 in the single GPU case. We have some initial plans sketched out, now we only need to implement them. Thanks for the report!
